text: Alan Bennett (born 1934) is an English author and actor. Alan Bennett may also refer to: *Alan Bennett (footballer, born 1931), English footballer for Port Vale *Alan Bennett (footballer, born 1949), Scottish footballer for Dumbarton FC *Alan Bennett (tenor) (born 1962), American operatic/oratorio tenor *Alan Bennett (footballer, born 1981), Irish footballer for Cork City and Ireland ==See also== *Charles Henry Allan Bennett (1872–1923), known as Allan Bennett, Buddhist monk
title: Alan Bennett (disambiguation)
